entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:28 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 4:48 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
